Header: Parents requested not to give Smart phones to children
Content: Senior Consultant of Psychology Professor D.S. Ranawaka has requested to refrain from giving Smart Mobile phones to children. He said this while attending the 20th Convention of the Sri Lanka Professional Consultants Institute. Consultants in physical, mental and health as well as diplomats attended the convention which is held once in two years. About 3,000 members of the institution are engaged in the services. Professor D.S. Ranawaka told parents not to give Smart Phones to the children and if they need, to give a basic level mobile. He said that the world has identified it as a more dangerous menace than the drug menace.
